etymology.description: 隹(隹) (zhuī, "bird") + 木(木) (mù, "tree") = birds gathering on a tree
etymology.interpretation: The character 集(jí, "assemble") visually represents birds, 隹(隹) (zhuī, "bird"), gathering on a tree, 木(木) (mù, "tree"), symbolizing the act of assembling or gathering together. This image effectively conveys the meaning of assembling similar to how birds might congregate in trees.

examples.chinese: 军队在黎明时分集结(軍隊在黎明時分集結)。
居民们在公园里集会(居民們在公園裡集會)。
examples.pinyin: Jūmín men zài gōngyuán lǐ jíhuì.
examples.english: The residents assembled in the park.

examples.chinese: 艺术家们将各自的作品集成一本画册(藝術家們將各自的作品集成一本畫冊)。
examples.pinyin: Yìshùjiā men jiāng gèzì de zuòpǐn jíchéng yī běn huàcè.
examples.english: The artists compiled their works into a picture book.
